page.title: 16 SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: Social concerns in this area vary according to age. Concern about litter was general to all age groups particularly where public gulleys were disfigured in this way. Environment was a major concern; people were keen on a tidy,pleasant area and showed disapproval of cars parked on grass verges. Cuts in bus services and increase in fares was a general concern, particularly with the elderly. Lack of state nursery facilities and leisure facilities were also a concern,as was the lack of a 6th form college. Unemployment,rates,vandelism,education and increase in immigrants were the main national concerns. Among others mentioned were nuclear defence and pollution.
